universal_guidelines: NEVER use generic 'SaaS Blue' gradients. Stick to solid, authoritative colors.
Data density is key for this dashboard. Use tight spacing in tables but generous spacing in layout containers.
Kanban columns must feel like 'swimlanes' - distinct but connected.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all monetary values and dates to ensure alignment.
Interactive elements MUST have a visible focus state for accessibility.
All buttons must have a subtle transition on hover (transform, shadow, or color).
Avoid 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' to give it a modern fintech vibe.
Ensure high contrast for text (Slate 600+ on White/Slate 50).
Components must be modular. Don't build monolithic page components.
instructions_to_main_agent: Create the 'Dashboard' with a Bento Grid layout showing: Key Metrics (Top), Recent Activity (List), and Revenue Chart (Chart).
Build the 'CRM Pipeline' using a horizontal scroll container with Drag-and-Drop (dnd-kit or react-beautiful-dnd).
Develop the 'Finance' module as a clean data table with sorting and filtering.
Use 'recharts' for any data visualization (Revenue, Leads).
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for validation.
Follow the file structure: /components/features/[module_name] for domain logic.
Use the provided image URLs for mock data.
